location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter No 54 from Ephraim Gerrish Stannus, Resident in the Persian Gulf, at Shiraz to William Newnham, Chief Secretary to the Government, Political Department, Bombay

mods.abstract: The letter is forwarding a request for remuneration (not present) from Meerza Ali Ackbar, the company's Persian agent at Shiraz, for his losses in the recent earthquake there (see f 2).It further explains that the Resident believes that his losses have been somewhat exaggerated, and that it should be possible to rebuild his house at modest expense. The letter provides details a loan the Resident has provided to him to meet his immediate needs, and explains that he has been furnished with a tent to provide him with short term shelter.
